channel.title: WickrMe problem - cannot view received images and cannot find new contact - wickr screen grayed out
channel.description: Heloo my problem is different, i have everything installed but i cant show pictures ppl sending to me and cant find a new contact. When i try to do these things wickr screen is greying out and nothing happenes. Somebody know whats wrong?

item.title: WickrMe problem - cannot view received images and cannot find new contact - wickr screen grayed out
item.dc:creator: JakeSmith
item.description:
I am experiencing this too… it seems to only happen on Whonix 15 (I could still get it to work on 14 until recently) Whenever I click on the button to open certain menus (add new chat partner, create new group, etc) the entire window gets a grey tint, but the menu doesn’t pop up. Has anyone else experienced this issue? If so, have you been able to get around it somehow?

Read full topic
item.source: WickrMe problem - cannot view received images and cannot find new contact - wickr screen grayed out
